tool_description: Instant Google Search URL Generator API provides a quick and efficient way to generate Google search URLs based on user queries.
name: Google URL Generator
title: Google URL Generator

api_list.name: Generate Search URL
api_list.description: This field takes in a text and return the search url for google
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-url-generator.p.rapidapi.com/generate-search-url/How to Create APIs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-url-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://google-url-generator.p.rapidapi.com/generate-search-url/{search}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-url-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
